name: Path to Harmony
description:
Blair always dreamed of being a righteous leader like the monarchs of legend. When a plague strikes and the Kingdom of Xingata's strained relationships with its neighbors snap, Blair gets a chance to prove their leadership in battle. But as they rise though the ranks it becomes clear not all is as it seems within the Xingatan military.

Inspired by titles like Fire Emblem, Path to Harmony combines a fantasy setting, tactics based game play, and a rich story told though character interaction. Play as Blair and lead 10 unique unit types through 14 battles to save the people of Xingata!
